org.chocosolver.solver.trace

Class Chatterbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chocosolver.solver.trace.Chatterbox

  • public class Chatterbox
extends Object
    This is not a logging framework (Choco relies on SLF4J) but aims at simplifying resolution trace output by providing a unique entry point for most (not to say all) resolution message.
    Since:
    12/11/14
    Version:
    choco
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Chatterbox.DefaultDecisionMessage
      The default decision message format
      static class  Chatterbox.DefaultSolutionMessage
      The default solution message format

      • printVersion

        public static void printVersion(Solver solver)
        Print the version message.
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver

      • printFeatures

        public static void printFeatures(Solver solver)
        Print (succint) features of the solver given in argument
        Parameters:
        solver - a solver

      • printAllFeatures

        public static void printAllFeatures(Solver solver)
        Print all features of the solver given in argument
        Parameters:
        solver - a solver

      • printStatistics

        public static void printStatistics(Solver solver)
        Print the resolution statistics.

        Recommended usage: to be called after the resolution step.

        Equivalent to: 

             System.out.println(solver.getMeasures().toString());
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate

      • printShortStatistics

        public static void printShortStatistics(Solver solver)
        Output the resolution statistics in a single line.

        Recommended usage: to be called after the resolution step.

        Equivalent to: 

             System.out.println(solver.getMeasures().toOneLineString());
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate

      • printCSVStatistics

        public static void printCSVStatistics(Solver solver)
        Output the resolution statistics in a comma-separated single line. The header is: 
             solutionCount;buildingTime(sec);initTime(sec);initPropag(sec);totalTime(sec);objective;nodes;backtracks;fails;restarts;fineProp;coarseProp;

        Equivalent to: 

             System.out.println(solver.getMeasures().toCSV());
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate

      • printSolutions

        public static void printSolutions(Solver solver,
                                  IMessage message)
        Print a posteriori the solutions found (beware, a solution recorder must has been defined).

        Recommended usage: to be called after the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to print solutions from
        message - the message to print per solution

      • printSolutions

        public static void printSolutions(Solver solver)
        Print a posteriori the solutions found (beware, a solution recorder must has been defined).

        Recommended usage: to be called after the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to print solutions from
        See Also:
        Chatterbox.DefaultSolutionMessage

      • showStatistics

        public static void showStatistics(Solver solver)
        Plug a search monitor which calls printVersion(org.chocosolver.solver.Solver) and printStatistics(Solver) before closing the search.

        Recommended usage: to be called before the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate

      • showShortStatistics

        public static void showShortStatistics(Solver solver)
        Plug a search monitor which calls printShortStatistics(Solver) before closing the search.

        Recommended usage: to be called before the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate

      • showSolutions

        public static void showSolutions(Solver solver,
                                 IMessage message)
        Plug a search monitor which outputs message on each solution.

        Recommended usage: to be called before the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate
        message - the message to print.

      • showSolutions

        public static void showSolutions(Solver solver)
        Plug a search monitor which outputs a message on each solution.

        Recommended usage: to be called before the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate
        See Also:
        Chatterbox.DefaultSolutionMessage

      • showDecisions

        public static void showDecisions(Solver solver,
                                 IMessage message)
        Plug a search monitor which outputs message on each decision.

        Recommended usage: to be called before the resolution step.

        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate
        message - the message to print.

        public static void showContradiction(Solver solver)
        Plug a search monitor which outputs the contradictions thrown during the search.
        Parameters:

      • showStatisticsDuringResolution

        public static void showStatisticsDuringResolution(Solver solver,
                                                  long f)
        Plug a search monitor which prints a one-line statistics every f ms.
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver to evaluate
        f - frequency, in millisecond
